articles.author: icc
articles.title: Recent heartbreak no concern for Dravid as India focus on T20 World Cup final - ICC Cricket
articles.description: The India coach believes losses to Australia in big finals last year will not affect how his team performs in Barbados.
articles.content:
While hopeful that a perfect game will come against South Africa, Dravid is a realist and is instead focused on helping the players stay relaxed and produce close to their best in the clash.

articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: First Time In 90 Years: Indian Women's Cricket Team Achieves Historic World Record - NDTV Sports
articles.description: India on Saturday recorded the highest team total in women's Test cricket on day two of the one-off Test against South Africa, surpassing the previous best of 575/9 set by Australia.
articles.content: India on Saturday recorded the highest team total in women's Test cricket on day two of the one-off Test against South Africa, surpassing the previous best of 575/9 set by Australia. Australia had po… [+1019 chars]
